desc: 強力な魔物の周囲を飛び回る黒い鳥から抜け落ちた羽

dictionary.lore: Muvs are black birds known to migrate in flocks among other powerful monsters and demons. Seen as scavengers that bring bad omens, their feathers are detested and have little value among common people who do not even consider it as a useful material. However, when used in a concoction only known to the Demon Slayers, it is said to be able to refine highly powerful magical catalysts.

name: ムヴの羽
